verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6942>"Sanctify<s%> to Me <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>first-born<s%>, the first <S%H6363>offspring<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7358>womb<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> both of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> it belongs to Me."

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H2142>"Remember<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3318>went<s%> out from <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery;<s%> for by a <S%H2392>powerful<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from <S%H2088>this<s%> place. And <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten.<s%>
"On this <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> of <S%H24>Abib,<s%> you are about to <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%>

"And it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> you to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to your fathers to <S%H1>give<s%> you, a <S%H5414>land<s%> <S%H776>flowing<s%> with <S%H2100>milk<s%> and <S%H2461>honey,<s%> that you shall <S%H1706>observe<s%> <S%H5647>this<s%> <S%H2088>rite<s%> in <S%H5656>this<s%> <S%H2088>month.<s%>

"For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H4682>"Unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> shall be <S%H398>eaten<s%> throughout the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> and <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H2557>leavened<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> among you, <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall any <S%H7603>leaven<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> among you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1366>borders.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'It is <S%H5668>because<s%> of <S%H2088>what<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> for me when I <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>'

"And it shall <S%H1961>serve<s%> as a <S%H226>sign<s%> to you on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and as a <S%H2146>reminder<s%> on your <S%H996>forehead,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> that the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> may be in your <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for with a <S%H2389>powerful<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
"Therefore, you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> at its <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> from <S%H3117>year<s%> to <S%H3117>year.<s%>

"Now it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>brings<s%> you to the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> as He <S%H7650>swore<s%> to you and to your fathers, and <S%H1>gives<s%> it to you,

that you shall <S%H5674>devote<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H6363>first<s%> <S%H6363>offspring<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7358>womb,<s%> and the <S%H6363>first<s%> <S%H7698>offspring<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%> that you <S%H1961>own;<s%> the <S%H2145>males<s%> belong to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"But <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>first<s%> <S%H6363>offspring<s%> of a <S%H2543>donkey<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H6299>redeem<s%> [it,] then you shall <S%H6202>break<s%> its <S%H6202>neck;<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> first-born of <S%H120>man<s%> among your <S%H1121>sons<s%> you shall <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>

"And it shall be <S%H3588>when<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H7592>asks<s%> you in <S%H4279>time<s%> to <S%H4279>come,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>'What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%>?' then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to him, 'With a <S%H2392>powerful<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slavery.<s%>

'And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about, <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7185>stubborn<s%> about <S%H7971>letting<s%> us <S%H7971>go,<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>first-born<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> the first-born of <S%H120>man<s%> and the first-born of <S%H929>beast.<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H2145>males,<s%> the first <S%H6363>offspring<s%> of <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7358>womb,<s%> but <S%H3605>every<s%> first-born of my <S%H1121>sons<s%> I <S%H6299>redeem.<s%>'

"So it shall <S%H1961>serve<s%> as a <S%H226>sign<s%> on your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and as <S%H2903>phylacteries<s%> on your <S%H996>forehead,<s%> <S%H5869><s%> for with a <S%H2392>powerful<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H7971>let<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> did not <S%H5148>lead<s%> them by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H3588>even<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> it was <S%H7138>near;<s%> for <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6435>"Lest<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5162>change<s%> their <S%H5162>minds<s%> when they <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4421>war,<s%> and they <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>"

Hence <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5437>led<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5437>around<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> to the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220><s%> <S%H3220>Sea;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up in <S%H2571>martial<s%> <S%H2571>array<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> with him, for he had made the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7650>solemnly<s%> <S%H7650>swear,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> shall <S%H6485>surely<s%> <S%H6485>take<s%> <S%H6485>care<s%> of you; and you shall <S%H5927>carry<s%> my <S%H6106>bones<s%> from <S%H2088>here<s%> with you."
Then they <S%H5265>set<s%> out from <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> and <S%H2583>camped<s%> in <S%H864>Etham<s%> on the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H1980>going<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> to <S%H5148>lead<s%> them on the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and in a <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%> to <S%H215>give<s%> them <S%H215>light,<s%> that they might <S%H1980>travel<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%> and by <S%H3915>night.<s%>

He did not <S%H4185>take<s%> <S%H4185>away<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H6051>cloud<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
